thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Canopy Growth To Issue $374 Mln in Shares to buy remainder of BC Tweed JV

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Canopy Growth To Issue $374 Mln in Shares to buy remainder of BC Tweed JV
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Canopy Growth Corp:
* CANOPY GROWTH ENTERS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE OUTSTANDING SHARES IN BC TWEED JOINT VENTURE
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - TO PURCHASE REMAINING 33% STAKE OF BC TWEED JOINT VENTURE INC NOT CURRENTLY OWNED BY COMPANY
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - UPON CLOSING OF DEAL, WILL ISSUE UP TO $374 MILLION WORTH OF SHARES TO MINORITY SHAREHOLDERS OF BC TWEED
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - DEAL PAYMENTS MILESTONE-BASED AND WILL BE RELEASED OVER FOUR YEARS BASED UPON ACHIEVEMENT OF CERTAIN PRODUCTION MILESTONES
* CANOPY GROWTH CORP - WILL ALSO PAY $1 MILLION IN CASH AS A NON-REFUNDABLE DEPOSIT AGAINST PURCHASE PRICE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
